description: Try our easy to follow Brown Sugar Meringues recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Meringue,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Halal,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Brown Sugar Meringues Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 130°C. Beat the egg whites in a bowl with an electric mixer until soft peaks form. Beat in the brown sugar, 2 tbsp at a time.

Line 2 baking sheets with wax paper. Using a heaping teaspoon for each, spoon the meringues, spaced about 2.5cm apart, on the baking sheet. Bake for 1 hour, or until they are crisp on the outside and slightly chewy inside.
